pkgmetadata.longdescription: Annotate the Gene Symbols for Probes in Expression Array // We curated 147 of expression array, from 3 species(human,mouse,rat), 3 companies('Affymetrix','Illumina','Agilent'), by aligning the 'Fasta' sequences of all probes of each platform to their corresponding reference genome, and then annotate them to genes.
